name: uptake
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology
  specialized the rate or act of taking something in: Plants in their growth stage exhibit an increased uptake of nutrients.
the rate or act of accepting something: There is a 90 percent uptake of vaccination in this country. Uptake of places on the training course has been disappointing.
